Okay, so I have been playing KSP quite a long time and pretty worn out, mods and stock and all that. Since KSP is made in unity and i made some complete games with unity i thought to go and mod KSP. I love programming and really hate some features of mods and probably try "fix" some (ofc for personal use under licence .

Question is "How to create mod for KSP". I saw mods use dll files which i have no idea about and never really tried to make a mod. Googling gave me how to install one , any modder out there or someone who knows how to do it please respond with answer or link to answer.

Thanks.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE

That thread is stickied in Add-on Development for a reason.

To be fair to the OP, I used that long ago to start playing with modding and I've found most of the linked stuff to be very outdated. Someone needs to do a complete overhaul on the tutorials and update, as well as remove the old stuff.

idk but this seems overwhelming, i will try to find sourcecodes on github of other mods and try go that way. otherwise i will go through that modding section.

thanks guys
Your thread has been moved to the add-on development section, where the people who do this sort of thing will see it.

To be fair to the OP, I used that long ago to start playing with modding and I've found most of the linked stuff to be very outdated. Someone needs to do a complete overhaul on the tutorials and update, as well as remove the old stuff.
